AT.name: Kid Icarus™ Von Mythen und Monstern
AT.description: Den Anfang machte Kid Icarus für NES (jetzt in der 3D Classics-Reihe für Nintendo 3DS), in dem der Engelskrieger Pit gegen Medusas Truppen ankämpfte. Fünf Jahre später feierte Pit seine Rückkehr in „Kid Icarus: Von Mythen und Monstern" für den Game Boy. Hier wird das ursprünglich vertikal scrollende Action-Spiel zu einem seitlich scrollenden Action-Abenteuer erweitert, in dem Pit sich den Lakaien des mysteriösen Dämonen Orcos gegenüberstellt. Es sollte 20 Jahre dauern, bis Pit sich wieder in die Lüfte schwingen würde – in „Kid Icarus: Uprising" für Nintendo 3DS!

CY.name: Kid Icarus™ Of Myths And Monsters
CY.description: First there was Kid Icarus for NES (and now 3D Classics for Nintendo 3DS) in which angelic warrior Pit fought against the forces of Medusa. Five years later, Pit returned in Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters for Game Boy; expanding on the original vertical-scrolling action game with a side-scrolling action-adventure, as Pit faces off against the forces of the mysterious demon Orcos. It would take 20 years for Pit to take flight again, in Kid Icarus: Uprising for Nintendo 3DS!

Fünf Jahre später feierte Pit seine Rückkehr in „Kid Icarus: Von Mythen und Monstern" für den Game Boy. BE.name: Kid Icarus™ Of Myths And Monsters
BE.description: Pit, l'ange guerrier, a d'abord vaincu Medusa dans Kid Icarus sur NES (et maintenant dans la série 3D Classics sur Nintendo 3DS). Cinq ans plus tard, il est revenu sur Game Boy dans Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters, un jeu d'action-aventure à défilement horizontal et vertical. Cette fois, il a dû anéantir les hordes maléfiques du mystérieux démon Orcos pour délivrer le monde... Il aura fallu vingt ans d'attente pour que Pit reprenne son envol dans Kid Icarus: Uprising sur Nintendo 3DS !

ES.name: Kid Icarus™ Of Myths And Monsters
ES.description: El primer capítulo de la saga Kid Icarus apareció para la NES, y ahora puedes volver a encontrarlo en la colección 3D Classics para la Nintendo 3DS. En esa ocasión, el guerrero angelical Pit tuvo que vérselas con las fuerzas de Medusa. Cinco años después, Pit regresó en una nueva aventura para Game Boy: Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters. En ella Pit se enfrentó a las fuerzas del misterioso demonio Orcos en un juego que combinaba el desplazamiento vertical del juego original con fases de desplazamiento horizontal. Ahora, veinte años después, ¡Pit vuelve a alzar el vuelo en "Kid Icarus: Uprising" para la consola Nintendo 3DS!

IT.name: Kid Icarus™ Of Myths And Monsters
IT.description: Il mito di Kid Icarus inizia con il primo omonimo episodio per NES (ora disponibile nella collana 3D Classics per Nintendo 3DS), in cui l'angelico guerriero Pit deve affrontare le forze delle tenebre guidate dalla perfida Medusa. Cinque anni più tardi, il nostro eroe torna sulla scena con Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters per Game Boy: a differenza del titolo precedente, Pit può ora muoversi in ogni direzione e deve vedersela con le forze di un misterioso demone di nome Orcos. Dovranno passare altri 20 anni perché il nostro angelico eroe possa spiccare di nuovo il volo, grazie a Kid Icarus: Uprising per Nintendo 3DS!

GB.name: Kid Icarus™ Of Myths And Monsters

PT.name: Kid Icarus™ Of Myths And Monsters
PT.description: Primeiro surgiu o Kid Icarus para a NES (e agora na versão 3D Classics para a Nintendo 3DS) no qual Pit, o guerreiro angélico, lutou contra as forças de Medusa. Cinco anos depois, Pit regressou em Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters para Game Boy. Pit enfrenta as forças do misterioso demónio Orcos, num jogo de ação em que a deslocação vertical do original é ampliada com uma aventura de ação com deslocação lateral. Foram precisos 20 anos para que Pit levantasse voo novamente em Kid Icarus: Uprising para a Nintendo 3DS!

RU.name: Kid Icarus™ Of Myths And Monsters
RU.description: Первая версия игры Kid Icarus вышла для консоли NES. По сюжету, отважный воин света Pit должен был противостоять злым чарам Медузы и в конце концов низвергнуть ее. Теперь эта игра вошла в серию 3D Classics, и в нее можно сыграть на Nintendo 3DS. Через пять лет после премьеры Kid Icarus появляется ее продолжение – Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters для Game Boy. В этой версии вертикальный экшн разрастается до масштабов приключенческого платформера. Теперь главному герою предстоит померяться силами с таинственным демоном по имени Orcos. И только 20 лет спустя Pit вступает в очередную битву со злом в новой версии игры Icarus: Uprising для Nintendo 3DS.

LV.name: Kid Icarus™ Of Myths And Monsters
LV.description: First there was Kid Icarus for NES (and now 3D Classics for Nintendo 3DS) in which angelic warrior Pit fought against the forces of Medusa. Five years later, Pit returned in Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters for Game Boy; expanding on the original vertical-scrolling action game with a side-scrolling action-adventure, as Pit faces off against the forces of the mysterious demon Orcos. NL.name: Kid Icarus™ Of Myths And Monsters
NL.description: Allereerst was er Kid Icarus op de NES (en nu in de 3D Classics-serie voor de Nintendo 3DS) waarin engelenstrijder Pit het opneemt tegen Medusa en haar boosaardige monsters. Vijf jaar later keert Pit terug in Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters voor de Game Boy. Het oorspronkelijk verticaalscrollende actiespel ontwikkelt zich in een horizontaal scrollend actie-avontuur, waarin Pit de confrontatie aangaat met de mysterieuze demoon Orcos en zijn strijdkrachten. Nu, 20 jaar later, slaat Pit zijn vleugels opnieuw uit in Kid Icarus: Uprising for Nintendo 3DS!
